title: So when Talon getting nerfed?
body: When an assassin can actually build defensive items and still one shot you.... Perm banned until fixed.

replies.body: damage masteries and some items will get nerfed next patch, can't await it.
Or you could learn to play.

He built one armor item because your team was all AD. Having 4 damage items and one defense item isnt  exactly gonna change much especially when you build 0 defense items. You're essentially complaining that Talon bursted a squishy while dealing true damage to them.

Or you could buy a chain mail or wardens mail early?

If you want to live through something then build something that lets you live through it.
